reference.title: cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine
reference.shortdesc: Specifies the line at which the typedef is introduced.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine> element is defined within <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation>. <cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine> has no content apart from the mandatory attributes name and value. Name is always “lineNumber”and valueis the location of the typedef within the source file.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="775"/> <cxxTypedefDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> </cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation>
